message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to be selling this product which I believe you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $18,000. Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that price is way too high for me. I'm willing to pay $6,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $18,000 represents fair value, I understand your initial offer may not reflect your final price point. To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. I believe this offer reflects the true value of the product.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $15,000 is still more than I'm looking to spend. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $10,500?
